channel.title: 4.9 Electronics Troubleshooting on FRC Zero
channel.description: Recent content in 4.9 Electronics Troubleshooting on FRC Zero

item.title: 4.9.4 Falcon 500 Fixes
item.description: What is a Falcon 500? The Falcon 500 is a motor and motor controller combination unit. It is a brushless motor with an integrated motor controller. The motor controller is a Talon FX motor controller. The motor is a brushless motor. Leaving aside any “Availability, Ethical (IFI Issues), Etc” The new Falcon v3s for the 2023 season have been noted to have a few issues. This page is a collection of fixes for those issues and to cover the basics of troubleshooting the Falcon 500 in the v1 and v2 variants as well.
